page.title: 12EVENTS IN GRIMSARGH
page.content: The 1st activity of the year is the Daffodil Tea at Mrs Watt's house. There is an Easter Bonnet Competition. There are various club activities throughout the year. 1985 saw the first Scout Barbecue. Food was included in the price of the tickets. The Black Knights provided the disco. There was also a school garden party held at the vicarage, where traditional Maypole dancing took place. The Field Day includes a procession, fairground rides, side shows. The next event is the Strawberry Splash where you go swimming and then have strawberries and cream. We move on to Bonfire night. There is a torchlight procession leading to Ploughfield Bakery where the bonfire and firework display are held. There is a Christmas fair at the school. A New Year's party at Franco's.
